description:
The '''new wave of new wave''' (often abbreviated as '''NWONW''') was a British [[alternative rock]] scene in the early 1990s. Bands in the scene were influenced by [[punk rock]] and [[New wave music|new wave]] acts such as [[the Clash]], [[Blondie (band)|Blondie]], and [[Buzzcocks]]. 

New wave of new wave bands included [[These Animal Men]], [[Smash (British band)|S*M*A*S*H]], and [[Elastica]]. The scene struggled after the arrival of [[Britpop]].
